plot: A young woman falls in love with the man of her dreams, not knowing that he's an embezzler who's about to flee the country.
title: Beggar's Holiday
plot_es: A young woman falls in love with the man of her dreams, not knowing that he's an embezzler who's about to flee the country.
plot_en: A young woman falls in love with the man of her dreams, not knowing that he's an embezzler who's about to flee the country.
